name: DBL - Mafu Cameroon - Box Pressed Toro
additionalNotes:
This is a brand that truly has it’s head in the game. Located in Tamboril, Santiago in the Dominican Republic (also known as “The World Capital Of Cigars”), DBL has their own dedicated factory, farms, aging rooms, and fully-staffed rolling facilities. Each one of their tobacco leaves undergoes 
The Mafu is a very powerful cigar that is balanced, complex, and packed with plenty of flavor. This cigar was blended with that bold, strong smoker in mind.  It is spicy and peppery with vanilla notes.
